title: Thrower troll (Trollheim)

properties.name: description
properties.value: A thrower troll is a troll that attacks with ranged. They are relatively annoying monsters that throw rocks at passing adventurers, regardless of being engaged in combat or not. They are rarely ever on their own, preferring to be together in groups. Unlike most other monsters, the thrower troll's attacks are always successful hits. As they are found in multi-way areas, being attacked by three or more thrower trolls at once can be deadly.

A thrower troll is a troll that attacks with ranged. They are relatively annoying monsters that throw rocks at passing adventurers, regardless of being engaged in combat or not. They are rarely ever on their own, preferring to be together in groups. Unlike most other monsters, the thrower troll's attacks are always successful hits. As they are found in multi-way areas, being attacked by three or more thrower trolls at once can be deadly.

Equipping a Neitiznot shield will reduce their maximum hit to 2.

A '''thrower troll''' is a [[troll]] that attacks with [[ranged]]. They are relatively annoying monsters that throw rocks at passing adventurers, regardless of being engaged in [[combat]] or not. They are rarely ever on their own, preferring to be together in groups. Unlike most other monsters, the thrower troll's attacks are always [[successful hit]]s. As they are found in [[multi-way]] areas, being attacked by three or more thrower trolls at once can be deadly.

Equipping a [[Neitiznot shield]] will reduce their maximum hit to 2.
